Class EditDistance

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.evaluation.clustering.EditDistance

  • @Reference(authors="Pantel, P. and Lin, D.",
           title="Document clustering with committees",
           booktitle="Proc. 25th ACM SIGIR conference on Research and development in information retrieval",
           url="http://dx.doi.org/10.1145/564376.564412")
public class EditDistance
extends Object
    Edit distance measures.

    Pantel, P. and Lin, D.
    Document clustering with committees
    Proc. 25th ACM SIGIR conference on Research and development in information retrieval

    Since:
    0.5.0

    Sascha Goldhofer
